bad_credentials: Unable to log in with provided credentials
email.errors.unique: Email address is already in use

self_hosted.title: Self-hosted
self_hosted.help: The best option for most users, with no limits on the number of listeners or disk space. You can use any hosting provider. In this plan we do not require any documents confirming the legality of broadcasting.
self_hosted.description: To install our software, the server must be completely clean and have no other control panels, databases or websites installed.
self_hosted.install_command: To install the software, run this command in the server terminal and follow the installation script instructions

hosted.title: Hosted at Streaming.center
hosted.help: The number of listeners, quality and disk space are charged. You will need to provide documents confirming the legality of the broadcast.
hosted.legal_1: I will provide the necessary documents
hosted.legal_1_help: You will have 5 days to send us documents
hosted.legal_2: I will not use copyrighted content.
hosted.legal_2_help: If you break the rules, your account will be blocked without the possibility of a refund.
hosted.legal_3_help: You can test the operation of the radio control panel without installation on your server for 5 days.
